name: 1 Terra
description:

Using the latest AI, we transform customer communication into seamless, automated experiences that drive sales, reduce costs, and deliver 24/7 support. From insurance and finance to tourism, hospitality, retail, telecom, and the public sector â€“ Terra empowers businesses of all sizes to unlock new growth opportunities. With simple integration across WhatsApp, Viber, Facebook, Instagram, and websites, we help you turn every conversation into real business results.
Industry solutions for insurance, tourism, hospitality, retail, telecom, and public sector.
focus_areas: Providing best-in-class AI tools for seamless customer communication.
